submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        res = 0
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse = True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse = True)
        vcount = 1
        hcount = 1
        totalCuts = len(horizontalCut)+len(verticalCut)
        horidx = veridx = 0
        while(totalCuts):
            #print((horidx, veridx, hcount, vcount, res))
            if horidx == m-1:
                res+=  verticalCut[veridx]*hcount
                veridx+=1
            
            elif veridx == n-1:
                res+=  horizontalCut[horidx]*vcount
                horidx+=1
            
            else:
                if horizontalCut[horidx]>=verticalCut[veridx]:
                    res+=  horizontalCut[horidx]*vcount
                    hcount+=1
                    horidx+=1
                else:
                    res+=  verticalCut[veridx]*hcount
                    vcount+=1
                    veridx+=1
            totalCuts-=1
        return res
